mapper.select: select b.CON_ROOM,a.FOOD_NAME,b.CON_STATE,b.CON_GOODS,count(a.FOOD_NAME) as NUMBERR from TAB_FOOD a join TAB_CON_RECORD b on a.food_id=b.con_goods group by a.FOOD_NAME,b.CON_STATE,b.CON_GOODS ,b.CON_ROOM having b.con_state=0
select a.FOOD_NAME,b.CON_STATE,b.CON_ROOM from TAB_FOOD a join TAB_CON_RECORD b on a.food_id=b.con_goods where b.con_state=1
mapper.update: update TAB_CON_RECORD set CON_STATE=1 where CON_GOODS=#{CON_GOODS} AND CON_ROOM=#{CON_ROOM}
